name: Gods of Egypt: On Location: Shooting in Australia
detailed_description: Sydney, Australia proved to be an ideal location to stage the combination of sets and blue screens needed for Gods Of Egypt. A variety of production techniques were employed to convey the immense size difference between gods and mortals.
